name: MoonTen
description:
This is a panic-match-3 game. You have ten seconds to score as high as you can. Persistence has not yet been implemented, so your high score is not currently remembered.

I've had some trouble with sound, so that's on hold. I am new as heck.

I used a tutorial by Awesome Tuts to help me make this project and I had help from ChatGPT for the code I couldn't fix. I didn't need as much help as I thought I would, to get here. Still debugging sound and persistence.

I started with the asset TimersMadeEasyLite by GolemiteGames, but I ended up rewriting it.

All in all, I am having fun with this. Can't wait to get that stuff fixed.
